segments.text: I see the little girl reaching up, waiting for a cookie, and it’s kind of cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, like she’s about to get the best treat ever.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how excited kids get over something so simple.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is trying so hard to get those cookies for her, and it’s sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn’t drop any, though.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way she’s looking at him is just adorable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel her excitement just by watching her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is so innocent and full of joy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could see her face when she finally gets that cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s moments like these that make life so special.
segments.speaker: PAR
